text:
<@U25PYL3Q8> I realized that it can't be a child theme because of the fact that it never had a theme.json. I thought the child theme had to "extend" to the parent from within the theme.json, unless there is some other way I don't know about.

I'm back to it this week on and off. Going to try a few things. Maybe I'll clone some of the template files to html and see what happens and continue messing with the theme, renaming and copying it again. If I don't make any progress, I'll let you know. It's not a rush, but maybe you could still take a peek or something, if you're available.

if you want to invite me to the portals â€” <mailto:nicholas@deckerdevs.com|nicholas@deckerdevs.com>  And if you send me an email outlinging some of this stuff I can can take a look at this in the next 48 hours
